Verses: 1 seeyonile Nirvisaaramaayirukkiravargalum Samaariyaavin Parvadhaththai Nambikkondirukkiravargalum, Jaadhigalin Thalaimaiyennappattu, Isravel Vamsaththaar Thedivarugiravargalumaagiya Ungalukku Aiyo!

2 neengal Kalnemattum Sendru, Avvidaththilirundhu Aamaadh Ennum Periya Pattanaththukkup Poi, Pelistharudaiya Kaadh Pattanaththukku Irangi, Avaigal Indha Raajyangalaippaarkkilum Nallavaigalo Endrum, Avaigalin Ellaigal Ungal Ellaigalaippaarkkilum Visthaaramaanavaigalo Endrum Paarungal.
3 theengunaal Dhooramendrennik Kodumaiyin Aasanam Kittivarumpadi Seydhu,
4 thandhak Kattilgalil Paduththukkondu, Thangal Manjangalinmel Savukkiyamaai Sayaniththu, Mandhaiyilulla Aattukkuttigalaiyum, Maattuththozhuvaththilulla Kandrukkuttigalaiyum Thindru,
5 thamburai Vaasiththup Paadi, Dhaaveedhaippol Keedhavaaththiyangalaith Thangalukku Undupanni,
6 periya Paaththirangalil Madhubaanaththaik Kudiththu, Sirandha Parimalathailangalaip Poosikkollugiraargal; Aanaalum Yoseppukku Neritta Aabaththukkuk Kavalaippadaamarpogiraargal.
7 aagaiyaal Avargal Siraiyiruppukkup Pogiravargalin Munnaniyile Povaargal; Ippadiye Selvamaai Sayaniththavargalin Virundhukondaadal Nindrupogum.

8 naan Yaakkobudaiya Menmaiyai Veruththu, Avanudaiya Aramanaigalaip Pagaikkiren; Naan Nagaraththaiyum Adhin Niraivaiyum Oppukkoduththuviduven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Thammudaiya Jeevanaik Kondu Aanaiyittaar Enbadhai Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar.
9 oru Veettile Paththupper Meedhiyaayirundhaalum Avargal Seththuppovaargal.

10 avargaludaiya Inaththaanaavadhu, Predhaththaith Thagikkiravanaavadhu Elumbugalai Veettilirundhuveliyekondupogumpadikku, Avaigalai Eduththu Veettin Utpuraththile Irukkiravanai Nokki: Unnidaththil Innum Yaaraayinum Undo Endru Ketpaan, Avan Illaiyenbaan; Appozhudhu Ivan: Nee Mownamaayiru; Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Sollalaagaadhu Enbaan.
11 idho, Karththar Kattalaiyittirukkiraar; Periya Veettaith Thirappugal Undaagavum, Siriya Veettai Vedippugal Undaagavum Adippaar.
12 kanmalaiyinmel Kudhiraigal Odumo? Ange Oruvan Maadugalaal Uzhuvaano? Nyaayaththai Nanjaagavum, Needhiyin Kaniyai Ettiyaagavum Maatrineergal.
13 naangal Engal Balaththinaale Engalukkuk Kombugalai Undaakkikkollavillaiyo Endru Solli, Veenkaariyaththil Magizhugiraargal.

14 isravel Vamsaththaare, Idho, Naan Oru Jaadhiyai Ungalukku Virodhamaaga Ezhuppuven; Avargal Aamaaththukkul Pravesikkira Vazhithodangi Samanaana Naattin Aarumattaaga Ungalai Odukkuvaargal Endru Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar.
